instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A1502 Dead ssd
threads.message:
not booting, put in another ssd system boots up perfect.

is there any final tests you can recommend to verify its completely dead before it goes in the bin?

threads.title: A1502 Dead ssd
threads.message: Do you just bin the dead ssds?

threads.title: A1502 Dead ssd
threads.message: Boot from external hdd macOS and see if internal ssd is showing up on DU. Or try internet recovery and see if it shows up in DU there

threads.title: A1502 Dead ssd
threads.message: Boot from USB and run disk utility. If no SSD hardware found it can indeed go in the trash.
